extendedInfo.description: Stay informed with the latest news, stock price and unit trust price on the go with The Star Mobile. Follow the development of the companies and people that you care about and receive timely email notifications.TESTED & SUPPORTED DEVICES:- Samsung I9100 Galaxy SII- Samsung Galaxy Nexus- Samsung Google Nexus S- Samsung Galaxy SIII- Samsung Galaxy Note GT-N7000- Samsung Galaxy Tab 7.7 (GT-P6800)- Samsung Galaxy Tab 10.1- Samsung Galaxy W (GT-I8150)- HTC Sense 4.0 Phone	- HTC One XFEATURES:Latest News - Browse through the latest The Star Online News- Read the news article in its entirety- Share the story with your friends- Scan through TheStar Online weekly photosStock Watchlist & Unit Trust- Get the latest quote on Bursa listed stocks and their related news- Create your own list of stocks to monitor- Manage your watchlist- Get the latest information on a comprehensive list of unit trustsiSnap (Augmented Reality)- Get a copy of TheStar newspaper and point your phone app over it to reveal additional interactive content- Now support 3D ModelsStar Classifieds Plus- Listing of the latest Star's ClassifiedsFollow- Follow the development of your favourite companies and people

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: Haven\'t fix the old problem! The application always being forced to close whenever user want to share the news.
reviews.author: ima yusop

reviews.title: Works fine now!
reviews.comment: Updated to the latest version, so far no more launching problems. Looks like the previous version bugs were fixed :)  5 stars if we could get more news like the Web version.
reviews.author: Ibnu Asad Zulfahri

reviews.title: Keep crashing
reviews.comment: Basically I dont know what\'s this app for, cannot read news at all. And keep crashing when use the i-snap. Pls look into these issues.

reviews.title: not scrolling
reviews.comment: I thought it would be great to be able to read some news from back home but... , think it\'d be great it I can scrollstill loads rather slowly even though I\'m using a very fast internet connection here.Streams movies just fine. Streams other news app just fine but a little slow On this one even though I can\'t scroll yet

reviews.comment: Unfortunately, the Star Mobile has stopped working. Keep crashing and isnap really waste of time.
